title: Build a Reactive app in Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢ with Spring Framework
description:
It‚Äôs now possible to develop fully reactive Java applications with frameworks like Spring WebFlux and Reactor. In this interactive workshop we'll explore the power of these frameworks and get hands on with a reactive implementation of the popular Spring Pet Clinic reference application.

We'll do all of our work in the cloud with Gitpod‚Äôs open source, zero-install and collaborative development environment . We'll use Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢ as the database to fit the highly concurrent, non-blocking nature of our reactive application and get familiar with the fully-managed database as-a-service called DataStax AstraDB.
